Contents.Content: SELECT STAFF_DICT.NAME, STAFF_DICT.DEPT_CODE, STAFF_DICT.USER_NAME, STAFF_DICT.JOB FROM STAFF_DICT WHERE 1=1 {0}
SELECT DEPT_DICT.DEPT_CODE, DEPT_DICT.DEPT_NAME, DEPT_DICT.INPUT_CODE FROM DEPT_DICT where 1=1 {0}

SELECT infecon_patient_master.Patient_id AS PatientCode ,infecon_patient_master.Patient_id AS MedicalRecordCode ,infecon_patient_master.Id_no AS PatientIDCard ,infecon_patient_master.Patient_id AS SocialSecurityCard ,infecon_patient_master.name AS PatientName ,infecon_patient_master.sex AS PatientSex ,infecon_patient_master.Date_of_birth AS PatientBirthday ,floor(months_between(sysdate,infecon_patient_master.Date_of_birth)/12) AS PatientAge ,infecon_patient_master.Mailing_address as PatientAddress ,NULL AS HighRiskInfectivity FROM infecon_patient_master WHERE rownum=1 {0}

SELECT infecon_pats_in_hospital.patient_id as InPatientCode, infecon_pats_in_hospital.Dept_name AS WardArea, infecon_pats_in_hospital.Dept_name AS InDepartment, null AS Nursing, infecon_pats_in_hospital.Bed_no AS BedNumber, null as InPatientDoctor, NULL AS BedNurse FROM infecon_pats_in_hospital WHERE rownum = 1 {0}

SELECT infecon_operation.Operation AS OperationName, infecon_operation.Patient_id AS MedicalRecordCode, null AS OperationID, null AS OperationDepartment, infecon_operation.Operating_room_no AS OperationRoom, infecon_operation.surgeon AS OperationDoctor, infecon_operation.Start_date_time AS OperationDate, infecon_operation.Start_date_time AS OperationBegin, null AS OperationEnd, null AS HandWashingNurse1, null AS HandWashingNurse2, null AS ItinerateNurse1, null AS ItinerateNurse2, NULL AS OperationOrderCode, NULL AS OperationStatus FROM infecon_operation WHERE rownum <= 5 {0} order by infecon_operation.Start_date_time DESC

SELECT infecon_clnic_master.Patient_id AS RegisterCode, infecon_clnic_master.Visit_no AS RegisterNumber, infecon_clnic_master.dept_name AS RegisterDepartment, infecon_clnic_master.Visit_date AS RegisterDateTime, infecon_clnic_master.Clinic_type AS OutPatientEmergency FROM infecon_clnic_master WHERE rownum = 1 {0} Order By Visit_Date DESC

SELECT infecon_patient_master.Patient_id AS PatientCode ,infecon_patient_master.Patient_id AS MedicalRecordCode ,infecon_patient_master.Id_no AS PatientIDCard ,infecon_patient_master.Patient_id AS SocialSecurityCard ,infecon_patient_master.name AS PatientName ,infecon_patient_master.sex AS PatientSex ,infecon_patient_master.Date_of_birth AS PatientBirthday ,floor(months_between(sysdate,infecon_patient_master.Date_of_birth)/12) AS PatientAge ,infecon_patient_master.Mailing_address as PatientAddress FROM infecon_patient_master WHERE rownum <= 200 {0}

SELECT infecon_patient_master.PATIENT_ID AS VALUE, infecon_patient_master.PATIENT_ID AS MedicalRecordCode, infecon_operation.Operation AS NAME, infecon_patient_master.name AS PatientName, infecon_patient_master.sex AS PatientSex, infecon_patient_master.name AS DISPLAYNAME, infecon_patient_master.Date_of_birth AS PatientBirthday, infecon_operation.Operation AS OperationName, null AS OperationID, null AS OperationDepartment, infecon_operation.Operating_room_no AS OperationRoom, infecon_operation.surgeon AS OperationDoctor, infecon_operation.Start_date_time AS OperationDate FROM infecon_operation LEFT JOIN infecon_patient_master ON infecon_operation.Patient_id = infecon_patient_master.Patient_id WHERE rownum <= 200 {0} Order By infecon_operation.Start_date_time DESC

SELECT infecon_patient_master.Patient_id AS VALUE, infecon_patient_master.Patient_id AS InPatientCode, infecon_patient_master.name AS NAME, infecon_patient_master.sex AS PatientSex, infecon_patient_master.name AS DISPLAYNAME, infecon_pats_in_hospital.Dept_name AS WardArea, floor(months_between(sysdate,infecon_patient_master.Date_of_birth)/12) AS PatientAge, infecon_pats_in_hospital.Dept_name AS InDepartment, null AS Nursing, infecon_pats_in_hospital.bed_no AS Bedno, NULL AS BedNurse, NULL AS InPatientDoctor FROM infecon_pats_in_hospital LEFT JOIN infecon_patient_master ON infecon_pats_in_hospital.Patient_id = infecon_patient_master.Patient_id WHERE 1=1 {0} Order By InPatientCode DESC

SELECT infecon_patient_master.Patient_id AS VALUE, infecon_clnic_master.Visit_no AS VisitNo, infecon_patient_master.name AS NAME, infecon_patient_master.sex AS SEX, infecon_patient_master.name AS DISPLAYNAME, infecon_clnic_master.Visit_dept AS VisitDepartment, infecon_clnic_master.Visit_date AS VisitDate, infecon_clnic_master.Clinic_type AS ClinicType, infecon_patient_master.Date_of_birth AS PatientBirthday FROM infecon_clnic_master LEFT JOIN infecon_patient_master ON infecon_clnic_master.Patient_id = infecon_patient_master.Patient_id WHERE rownum <= 200 {0} Order By VisitDate DESC
